idea-plugin.name: emacsIDEAs
idea-plugin.description:
Porting some great extensions of emacs to Intellij IDEA. such as AceJump, CopyWithoutSelectAction.

AceJump:

  • C-L 't' 'm' : Basic Jump | Type C-L, then type target char (e.g. 't') to jump to, then type marker char (e.g. 'm') to move caret.
  • C-L ' ' 'm' : Jump to line end | To show marker on line end, type space ' ' as target char
  • C-L ',' 'm' : Jump to hard typed key | Show markers on .{}()_=
  • C-L c 'm' : Copy jump area
  • C-L x 'm' : Cut jump area
  • C-L p 'm' : Paste clipborad content to target place
  • C-L P 'm' : Insert '\n' and Paste clipborad content to target place
  • C-L s 'm' : Select jump area

Copy without selection:

  • C-c w : Copy word
  • C-c s : Copy string
  • C-c l : Copy line
  • C-c q : Copy quoted, such as abcd in "abcd"
  • C-c a : Copy to line beginning
  • C-c A : Copy to file beginning
  • C-c e : Copy to line end
  • C-c E : Copy to file end
  • C-c p : Copy paragraph
  • C-c ' ' (w | s | l | q | a | A | e | E | p) : Type one space to cut related area
  • C-c ' ' ' ' (w | s | l | q | a | A | e | E | p) : Type two space to select related area

Other:

  • C-c i : Jump to next error quick fix intention
  • C-c I : Jump to next error quick fix intention, and show intention popup
  • C-c ' ' i : Type a spece prefix key to jump to previous error quick fix intention
